title: Freelance Frontend Developer (Project-based)
description:
• Collaborated on the development of two responsive landing pages for commercial clients, focusing on clean UI and performance.
     • Participated in client meetings to gather requirements and deliver tailored web solutions aligned with their branding and goals.
      • Built user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, ensuring cross-device compatibility.

title: FullStack Developer & IT Lead
description:
• Led the redesign of CNC machinery firmware built with C, resulting in a 20% increase in processing speed.
     •Implemented the company website utilizing React and optimized for performance using Redux, transferring clear and structured design requirements.
     • Developed a robust project management tool utilizing Express and React, boosting project tracking efficiency by 30%.
